casebody.data:
IN RE: J.M. & J.M. 363PA17-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. January 9, 2018 Joyce L. Terres, Assistant Appellate Defender, for Martin, Willie (III). Cathy L. Moore, Assistant County Attorney, for Durham County DSS. Erica R. Messimer, Attorney at Law, Charlotte, Matthew Wunsche, Attorney at Law, Durham, for GAL.

Amended

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 5th of January 2018 by Petitioner and GAL to Dismiss Appeal:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 9th of January 2018."
